result.html: Ní thuigimI don't understand.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫuigimI don't understand.

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.html: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ponchtml: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.eng: I didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ga: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.orig: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.html: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫuig mé gaċ focal aċ ṫuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.

result.html: Tuigim Go raibh maith agatI understand. Thank you.
result.ponchtml: Tuigim Go raiḃ maiṫ agatI understand. Thank you.

result.html: Tá brón orm Ní thuigimI'm sorry. I don't understand.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm Ní ṫuigimI'm sorry. I don't understand.

result.eng: No imagination at all is needed to understand this.
result.ga: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscint
result.orig: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscint
result.html: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscintNo imagination at all is needed to understand this.
result.ponchtml: Níl saṁlaíoċt ar biṫ ag teastáil ċun é seo a ṫuiscintNo imagination at all is needed to understand this.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
